channel.title: Theatre Addict TV
channel.itunes:subtitle: Barkersfield arts coverage from TheatreAddict.com
channel.itunes:author: TheatreAddict.com
channel.itunes:summary: Every week the TheatreAddict.com podcast takes you behind the scenes in the Bakersfield theatre community for exclusive backstage interviews, theatre news, and plenty of juicy gossip. Join your host, Aaron Mauldin, as local thespians sound-off about their passions and latest projects. It's time for some more drama in B-town!
channel.description: Every week the TheatreAddict.com podcast takes you behind the scenes in the Bakersfield theatre community for exclusive backstage interviews, theatre news, and plenty of juicy gossip. Join your host, Aaron Mauldin, as local thespians sound-off about their passions and latest projects. It's time for some more drama in B-town!
channel.itunes:keywords: bakersfield, theatre, theater, drama, addict, theatreaddict, theateraddict, theatreaddict.com, Aaron Mauldin, arts, art, community, actors, acting, shows, show, performing, dramatic, kern county, california, articles, reviews, interviews, discussion, blog, plays, video, vidcast

item.title: The Rocky Horror Show
item.itunes:author: TheatreAddict.com
item.itunes:subtitle: May 2007, Bakersfield Community Theatre
item.itunes:summary: A three minute video compilation highlighting the kinky fun of "Rocky Horror." This bawdy musical is a cult classic the world over.
item.itunes:keywords: rocky horror, bakersfield, theatre, musicals, rocky horror show, theater, bakersfield, community, theatre, musical

item.title: A Streetcar Named Desire
item.itunes:author: TheatreAddict.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Playing at the Spotlight Theatre through June 2
item.itunes:summary: Video preview of the Tennessee Williams classic. Directed by Bob Kempf. Starring Sheila McClure, Amy Hall, Rikk Chesire, and Jeremiah Lowry.
item.itunes:keywords: spotlight, theatre, theater, streetcar, named, desire, Tennessee Williams, acting, bakersfield

item.title: Bent
item.itunes:author: TheatreAddict.com
item.itunes:subtitle: A Tragic Love story set in the Holocost
item.itunes:summary: Actors Justin Brooks & Ronnie Hargrave discuss their roles in the show and the meaning behind the play. Closing weekend May 25 and 26 at The Empty Space.
item.itunes:keywords: theatre, theater, empty space, actors, acting, bent, shows, bakersfield

item.title: SPACE: The Musical
item.itunes:author: TheatreAddict.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Melodrama Paraody of Star Wars, Star Trek, & More
item.itunes:summary: The Gaslight Melodrama paraodies all of your favorite space-theme shows and movies in this hilarious musical romp. This video preview brings you into the front row for opening night, but you'll have to get tickets for yourself for the real experience.
item.itunes:keywords: gaslight, melodrama, space, musical, theatre, theater, drama, acting, singing, trek, star wars, bakersfield, california

item.title: RAT: A Midsummer Night's Ream
item.itunes:author: TheatreAddict.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Royally Offensive Sketch Comedy - June 2007
item.itunes:summary: The "Royal Association Of Thespians" (or RAT) plays by its own rules. It is unknown what those rules are, aside from the fact that their comedy is always big, funny, and guaranteed to offend people of all ages and creeds. This short video will give you a taste of that RAT flavor.
item.itunes:keywords: rat, royal, association, thespians, june, empty, space, sketch, comedy, offensive, video, jokes, humor, humorous, offensive, vidcast

item.title: Hair
item.itunes:author: TheatreAddict.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Make love, not war
item.itunes:summary: Montage of scenes from "Hair: The American Tribal Love-Rock Musical." June & July 2007 at the Empty Space, Bakersfield California.
item.itunes:keywords: rat, royal, association, thespians, june, empty, space, sketch, comedy, offensive, video, jokes, humor, humorous, offensive, vidcast

item.title: The History Of Rock & Roll Goes To The Movies!
item.itunes:author: TheatreAddict.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Music from your favorite movies on your favorite stage
item.itunes:summary: Montage of music from your favorite movies as the History of Rock & Roll takes on Hollywood! Playing at the Spotlight Theatre in Bakersfield, California through August 18th.
item.itunes:keywords: history, rock, roll, movies, spotlight, theatre, bakersfield, kern, county, musicals, performances, entertainment, fun, plays, shows, live, stage
